detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'dd > ul > li:nth-child(2) > a');}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'dd > ul > li:nth-child(3) > a');}

tabs.list: function Main(html){return jsoups(html,'div.fed-tabs-info > div > div > div > ul > li');}
tabs.name: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'a');}

catalogs.list: function Main(html){return jsoups(html,'div.fed-tabs-item > div > div > div > ul');}

comic.list: var mh_info,image_info;function cdecrypt(key, word) { var key = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(key); var decrypt = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(word, key, { mode: CryptoJS.mode.ECB, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }); return CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decrypt).toString() };function Main(html){log(CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse(strmiddle(html,'C_DATA=\'','\'')).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8));javaScript(cdecrypt('JRUIFMVJDIWE569j', CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse(strmiddle(html,'C_DATA=\'','\'')).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8)));var endid = mh_info.totalimg;var murl = 'http://'+mh_info.domain+'/comic/'+mh_info.imgpath;var obj= [];for(var i =1;i<endid;i++){var num = i;var n=4;var a = (Array(n).join(0) + num).slice(-n);obj.push(murl+a+'.jpg');};return obj;}
